headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Benefactor Schlagen GT
content:
The Benefactor Schlagen GT is now available – but buyer beware, some cars are not for the faint of heart.

You probably expect it to handle like a nice, well-behaved, race-tuned sports car. Then you touch the gas, the Schlagen announces its intention to go from zero to soil-yourself, and you realise you’ve made a very wise investment indeed.
